sectionInfo.title: Professional Experience
sectionInfo.description: My journey as a developer, showcasing the projects and roles that have shaped my career.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description: Led performance optimization initiatives and automated testing workflows for transportation industry applications. Focused on system performance analysis and documentation.
achievements: Reduced system response time by 20% through performance optimization
Improved application speed via in-depth performance analysis
Automated testing with Jenkins, reducing manual effort by 40%
Created system documentation, reducing onboarding time by 30%

jobs.title: Junior Software Analyst
jobs.description: Focused on test automation and analysis using the Jasmine framework. Developed maintainable automation code and managed test cases based on customer requirements.
achievements: Analyzed 100+ test cases using Jasmine, improving efficiency by 25%
Increased test coverage by 30% through automation
Met 100% project deadlines through effective task prioritization

jobs.title: IoT Engineering Intern
jobs.description: Developed IoT solutions for industrial automation and smart agriculture applications. Specialized in sensor integration, embedded systems programming, and mobile app development for remote monitoring and control systems.
achievements: Built smart plant nursery system with Arduino for automated environmental control
Developed Android app for remote monitoring, improving efficiency by 70%
Achieved 95% accuracy in sensor measurements and data processing
Created system documentation and collaborated with agricultural experts
